:v-model.description: A list of files that have been uploaded

accept.description: Types of files allowed to be uploaded, [Details]( https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/Input/file#%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%85%81%E8%AE%B8%E7%9A%84%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B)
accept.description_zh: 允许上传的文件类型，[详细说明](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/Input/file#%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%85%81%E8%AE%B8%E7%9A%84%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E7%B1%BB%E5%9E%8B)

name.description: The identifier, usually a unique string or number, can be obtained in the second argument of the callback function
name.description_zh: 标识符，通常为一个唯一的字符串或数字，可以在回调函数的第二项参数中获取

preview-size.description: The dimensions of the preview image and the upload area, the default unit is px
preview-size.description_zh: 预览图和上传区域的尺寸，默认单位为 px

preview-image.description: Whether to display the preview image after the upload is complete
preview-image.description_zh: 是否在上传完成后展示预览图

preview-full-image.description: Whether to display a full-screen image preview after clicking the preview image
preview-full-image.description_zh: 是否在点击预览图后展示全屏图片预览

:preview-options.description: For the configuration item of full-screen image preview, see [ImagePreview](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/image-preview)
:preview-options.description_zh: 全屏图片预览的配置项，可选值见 [ImagePreview](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/image-preview)

multiple.description: Whether to enable multi-selection of images is not supported on some Android models
multiple.description_zh: 是否开启图片多选，部分安卓机型不支持

readonly.description: Whether to set the upload region to read-only
readonly.description_zh: 是否将上传区域设置为只读状态

deletable.description: Whether to display a delete button

reupload.description: Whether to enable overlay upload, after which image preview will be disabled
reupload.description_zh: 是否开启覆盖上传，开启后会关闭图片预览

show-upload.description: Whether to display the upload area

lazy-load.description: Whether to enable lazy loading of images must be used in conjunction with the [Lazyload](#/en-CN/lazyload) component
lazy-load.description_zh: 是否开启图片懒加载，须配合 [Lazyload](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/lazyload) 组件使用

capture.description: Image selection mode, optional value is 'camera' (directly calls up the camera)
capture.description_zh: 图片选取模式，可选值为 `camera` (直接调起摄像头)

:after-read.description: The callback function after the file is read
:after-read.description_zh: 文件读取完成后的回调函数

:before-read.description: The callback function before the file is read returns 'false' to terminate the file reading and supports the return of a Promise
:before-read.description_zh: 文件读取前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可终止文件读取， 支持返回 Promise

:before-delete.description: The callback function before the file is deleted, which returns 'false' to terminate the file read, and supports returning a Promise
:before-delete.description_zh: 文件删除前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可终止文件读取， 支持返回 Promise

max-size.description_zh: 文件大小限制，单位为 byte

max-count.description: Limit on the number of files that can be uploaded

result-type.description: File read result type, optionally 'file' text
result-type.description_zh: 文件读取结果类型，可选值为 `file` text

image-fit.description: Preview image cropping mode, optional values can be found in the [Image](#/en-CN/image) component
image-fit.description_zh: 预览图裁剪模式，可选值见 [Image](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/image) 组件

upload-icon.description: Upload the name of the region icon or the link of the image, which is equivalent to the [name attribute](#/en-CN/icon#props) of the Icon component.
upload-icon.description_zh: 上传区域图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

methods.name: chooseFile
methods.description: Proactively invoke file selection, which is only valid in the context of the user-triggered action due to browser security restrictions
methods.description_zh: 主动调起文件选择，由于浏览器安全限制，只有在用户触发操作的上下文中调用才有效

ResultType.name: file
ResultType.description: 结果仅包含 File 对象

ResultType.name: text
ResultType.description: 结果包含 File 对象，以及文件的文本内容

ResultType.name: dataUrl
ResultType.description: 结果包含 File 对象，以及文件对应的 base64 编码

events.name: oversize
events.description: Triggered when the file size exceeds the limit
events.description_zh: 文件大小超过限制时触发

events.name: click-upload
events.description: Triggered when you click on the upload region

events.name: click-preview
events.description: Triggered when you click on the preview image

events.name: click-reupload
events.description: Triggered when you click Overwrite upload

events.name: close-preview
events.description: Triggered when full-screen image preview is turned off
events.description_zh: 关闭全屏图片预览时触发

events.name: delete
events.description: Triggered when a file preview is deleted

slots.name: preview-cover
slots.description: Customize the content overlaid above the preview area
slots.description_zh: 自定义覆盖在预览区域上方的内容
